name: Tru Savage v1.0 GUWOP
description:
https://shootemgames.jimdofree.com/

A game with no core gameplay!

Each level is different and unique, and the story is very intriguing!

The game is about an african american male that needs to join a gang (bloods) as a consequence to his fight with another gang member (crips).

!! There is no saving system in the game, It's a one session play.

Controls:

You move with W,A,S,D.

You shoot with the cursor.

You exit the game with ESC.
